uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.coregame

Class ProcessStateStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.coregame.ProcessStateStats

  • public class ProcessStateStats
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains statistics that concern the: - number of valid moves. - number of transitions in the states. - number of passed ingredients. - number of icing blockers removed. - pair of swapped candies.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProcessStateStats() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void incrementIcing()
      Function that increments the icing removed in that move.
      void incrementPassedIngredients()
      Indicate that one more ingredient was removed from the board.
      void incrementTransitions()
      Function that increments the transitions in the process state diagram.
      void reset()
      Function that resets the counters to the default values.
      void setCandiesSwapped(Candy candy1, Candy candy2)
      Set the candies that were swapped in the last move.
      void setShuffled(boolean wasShuffled)
      Indicate that the board was shuffled in this round.
      void setValidMoves(int moves)
      Set the number of available valid moves in the current state.
      ProcessStateStatsViewer toViewer()
      Get an immutable version of the stats that have been gathered so far.
